import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ServApiService } from 'src/app/Services/serv-api.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent implements OnInit { constructor(public ServApiService: ServApiService) {} ngOnInit(): void { } }
